Package org.cougaar.core.persist

This package contains the Cougaar persistence and rehydration support.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ActivePersistenceObject An object that requires special persistence and rehydration handling.
NotPersistable A marker interface for objects that should not be persisted.
Persistable A marker interface for persistable objects.
Persistence An extended persistence interface for BlackboardPersistence.
PersistenceClient Required service requestor API for the PersistenceService.
PersistencePlugin A media-specific persistence handler for reading and writing snapshots.
PersistencePluginSupport Support methods for PersistencePlugins.
PersistenceService This service allows clients to rehydrate data from the most recent persistence snapshot.
PersistenceServiceForAgent This service is an extended PersistenceService for use by the agent.
PersistenceServiceForBlackboard This service is an extended PersistenceService for use by the blackboard's BlackboardPersistence, including the PersistenceServiceForBlackboard.persist(boolean, boolean) method.
PersistenceState An opaque marker class used to persist state of an object which is not itself persistable.
PersistenceStream Marker interface for persistence I/O streams.
 

Class Summary
BlackboardPersistence Persistence interface for the Blackboard.
BufferedFilePersistence This PersistencePlugin saves and restores blackboard objects in files.
BufferedFileSystem Support for buffered and otherwise queued access to the file system.
DatabasePersistence This PersistencePlugin saves blackboard objects in a database.
DataProtectionInputStreamStub A trivial InputStream for testing the DataProtectionService.
DataProtectionKeyStub A trivial DataProtectionKey used by the DataProtectionInputStreamStub.
DataProtectionOutputStreamStub A trivial OutputStream for testing the DataProtectionService.
DataProtectionServiceStub A trivial DataProtectionService implementation.
DummyPersistence A PersistencePlugin that does nothing.
Exercise This component exercises the blackboard and can be used to debug trivial persistence problems.
FileMutex A file lock.
FilePersistence This PersistencePlugin saves and restores blackboard objects in files.
FilePersistenceBase This PersistencePlugin abstract base class saves and restores blackboard objects in files.
PersistenceAssociation This class establishes an association between an object that has been persisted and a reference number.
PersistenceControlPlugin This component creates blackboard OperatingModes that control persistence settings.
PersistenceIdentity A unique PersistenceClient identifier.
PersistenceInputStream Read persisted objects from a stream.
PersistenceMetricImpl PersistenceMetricsService.Metric implementation.
PersistenceMetricsServiceImpl PersistenceMetricsService implementation.
PersistenceMetricsServlet This component is a Servlet that displays the persistence snapshots available for the agent, and allows the user to request a Full Persistence snapshot.
PersistenceObject An opaque class to contain the persistence snapshot.
PersistenceOutputStream Write persistable objects to a stream.
PersistencePluginAdapter Adapter to simplify writing PersistencePlugin implementations.
PersistenceReference Objects of this class replace objects that have been previously persisted.
PersistenceServiceComponent This component advertises the PersistenceService and manages all persistence activities except for the actual storage of persistence deltas, which is done by PersistencePlugins.
PersistenceSubscriberState Persistence state for a blackboard Subscriber.
RehydrateTest Test class to rehydrate an agent snapshot and print the contents.
RehydrationData Rehydration has two results to return, where this little class simply bundles them together.
RehydrationResult Rehydration has three results to return, where this little class simply bundles them together.
SequenceNumbers A persistence sequence range and timestamp.
TestFullSnapshot This component tests BlackboardService.persistNow()
 

Exception Summary
NotPersistableException An Exception thrown when an object can not be persisted.
PersistenceException An exception to be throw when exceptions occur during persistence operations.
PersistenceNotEnabledException A exception thrown by BlackboardService.persistNow().
 

Package org.cougaar.core.persist Description

This package contains the Cougaar persistence and rehydration support.

The primary client is the StandardBlackboard, which uses persistence to periodically capture the agent's blackboard state, and rehydrate that state when the agent is restarted (either from a crash or mobility).

A modified ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream is used to support persistence deltas, where references to unchanged objects are serialized instead of the full objects. This requires Cougaar to override these JVM classes on the Java command line, by using:

 -Xbootclasspath/p:$COUGAAR_INSTALL_PATH/    .... something ...

Additional PersistenceService clients include the agent's component model manager, which saves the agent's list of components in the persistence snapshot.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
